snippet: The Real Madrid playmaker James Rodríguez was caught by the police driving about 125 miles per hour on his way to a training session.
abstract: Real Madrid midfielder James Rodriguez faces large fine after his arrest for driving 125 miles per hour in 75 mph zone; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Real Madrid playmaker James Rodríguez was caught by the police driving about 125 miles per hour on his way to a training session.
